00034 namespace uvm {

00036 extern bool uvm_regex_match(const char * re, const string & arg);
00037 
00038 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 //
00040 // Class: uvm_pool
00041 //
00042 // Template class for pools.
00043 //
00044 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 template<class T>
00046 class  uvm_pool : public uvm_object 
00047 {
00048 
00049 public:
00050 
00051 public:
00052 
00053     typedef class uvm_pool<T> this_type;
00054 
00055     virtual string get_type_name() const { return gen_type_name<this_type>(); }
00056 
00057     map<string, T*> _pool_map2;
00058 
00059     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060     // Constructor: uvm_pool
00061     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062     uvm_pool(string name) :
00063         uvm_object(name)
00064     {
00065     }
00066 
00067     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068     // Destructor: uvm_pool
00069     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070     virtual ~uvm_pool()
00071     {
00072         _pool_map.clear();
00073     }
00074 
00075     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076     // Function: get
00077     //   Returns a pointer to the named item if it exists in the pool otherwise NULL.
00078     //
00079     // Parameter:
00080     //  name - name of the item (std::string)
00081     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082     virtual T*  get (const string& name)
00083     {
00084         T* item;
00085 
00086         typename map< string, T* >::iterator it;
00087         it = _pool_map.find(name);
00088         if (it == _pool_map.end())
00089         {
00090             item = new T(name);
00091             _pool_map[name] = item;
00092         }
00093         return _pool_map[name];
00094     }
00095 
00096     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097     // Function: find
00098     //   Returns a vector of items that match regular expression passed in.
00099     //
00100     // Parameter:
00101     //  name - search string 
00102     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103     vector<T*> find(const char* name)
00104     {
00105         typename map<string, T*>::const_iterator it;
00106         vector<T*> item_vector;
00107 
00108         for (it = _pool_map.begin(); it != _pool_map.end(); it++)
00109         {
00110             if (uvm_regex_match(it->first, name))
00111                 item_vector.push_back(it->second);
00112         }
00113         return item_vector;
00114     }
00115   
00116     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117     // Function: remove
00118     //   Removes object from the pool if it exists, returns false if item doesn't
00119     //   exist.
00120     //
00121     // Parameter:
00122     //  name - name of the item (std::string)
00123     //
00124     // Returns:
00125     //   status - true if item exist in pool
00126     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127     virtual bool remove (const string &name)
00128     {
00129         typename map<string, T*>::iterator it;
00130         it = _pool_map.find(name);
00131         if (it == _pool_map.end())
00132         {
00133             return false;
00134         }
00135         else
00136         {
00137             _pool_map.erase(name);
00138             return true;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143     // Function: exist
00144     //   Removes true if the named item exists in the pool.
00145     //   exist.
00146     //
00147     // Parameter:
00148     //   name - name of the item (std::string)
00149     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150     bool exists (const string &name)
00151     {
00152         typename map<string, T*>::iterator it;
00153         it = _pool_map.find(name);
00154         if (it == _pool_map.end())
00155             return false;
00156         else
00157             return true;
00158     }
00159 
00160     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161     // Function: size
00162     //   Returns the number of items in the pool
00163     //
00164     // Returns:
00165     //   size - number of items in pool (int)
00166     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00167     int size(void)
00168     {
00169         return _pool_map.size();
00170     }
00171 
00172     static this_type * get_pool(const string &name, uvm_object *owner=NULL)
00173     {
00174         this_type* item;
00175         typename map<string, this_type*>::iterator it;
00176         string n = name;
00177         if (owner != NULL) {
00178             if (n == "") {
00179                 n = owner->get_full_name();
00180             } else {
00181                 n = owner->get_full_name() + "." + name;
00182             }
00183         }
00184         it = _pools.find(n);
00185         if (it == _pools.end())
00186         {
00187             item = dynamic_cast<this_type*>(uvm_create_object(gen_type_name<this_type>(), "", n, false));
00188              // VY It doesn't compile without regex: assert(item);
00189             _pools[n] = item;
00190         }
00191         return _pools[n];
00192     }
00193     static this_type * get_pool(uvm_object *owner)
00194     {
00195         return get_pool("", owner);
00196     }
00197 
00198     static this_type * get_global_pool() {
00199         return get_pool("global_pool");
00200     }
00201 
00202     virtual void do_print(std::ostream&) const {;}
00203     virtual void do_pack(uvm::uvm_packer&) const {;}
00204     virtual void do_unpack(uvm::uvm_packer&) {;}
00205     virtual void do_copy(const uvm::uvm_object*) {;}
00206     virtual bool do_compare(const uvm::uvm_object*) const { return true;}
00207 
00208 protected:
00209 
00210     map<string, T*> _pool_map;
00211 
00212     static map<string, this_type*> _pools;
00213 
00214     static int uvm_object_register_uvm_pool;
00215 };
00216 
00217 template <class T> class uvm_object_creator_uvm_pool : public uvm_object_creator
00218 {
00219 public:
00220     uvm_object* create(const string& name)
00221     {
00222         uvm_object* _uvmsc_obj = new uvm_pool<T>(name);
00223         _uvmsc_obj->set_name(name);
00224         return _uvmsc_obj;
00225     }
00226 };
00227 
00228 template <typename T> std::map<string, uvm_pool<T>*> uvm_pool<T>::_pools;
00229 
00230 // auto register
00231 template <typename T> int uvm_pool<T>::uvm_object_register_uvm_pool = uvm::uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator(gen_type_name<uvm_pool<T> >, new uvm_object_creator_uvm_pool <T> ());
00232 
00233 } // namespace
